oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de Visite of Lt. Thomas C. White, Co. G, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de Visite of Lt. Thomas C. White, Co. G, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA, a regiment composed largely of men from Carter County. Thomas Claiborne White was born on February 13, 1838, in Carter County, Tennessee. He was the son of Lawson H. and Mary Elizabeth Clark White. White married Mary Ann Smith on August 14, 1862. He died on April 9, 1884, and is buried in the Rittertown Baptist Church Cemetery in Carter County. On his coat is a badge with a star and crossed sabers also seen on cart005.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: White, Thomas C.
